        currentSongIndex: action.currentSongIndex

        playList: action.playList
      };

    case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_SEQUENCE:
      return { ...state,
        playSequence: action.playSequence
      };

    case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_LIST_COUNT:
      return { ...state,
        playListCount: action.playListCount
      };

    case actionTypes.CHANGE_LYRIC_LIST:
      return { ...state,
        lyricList: action.lyricList
      };

    case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_LYRIC_INDEX:
      return { ...state,
        currentLyricIndex: action.currentLyricIndex
      };

    default:
      return state;
  }
}

export default reducer;

    ],
    playSequence: 0, // 0循环播放  1随机播放  2单曲循环
    playListCount:0,
    firstLoad: true,
    lyricList: [],
    currentLyricIndex: 0,
    isPlaying:false
}

function reducer(state=defaultState,action){
    switch(action.type){
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_SONG:
            return {
                ...state,
                currentSong:action.currentSong
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_SONG_PLAY_URL:
            return {
                ...state,
                currentSongPlayUrl:action.currentSongPlayUrl
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_SONG_INDEX:
            return {
                ...state,
                currentSongIndex:action.currentSongIndex
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_LIST:
            return {
                ...state,
                playList:action.playList
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_SEQUENCE:
            return {
                ...state,
                playSequence:action.playSequence
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_PLAY_LIST_COUNT:
            return {
                ...state,
                playListCount:action.playListCount
            };
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_LYRIC_LIST:
            return {
                ...state,
                lyricList:action.lyricList
            }
        case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_LYRIC_INDEX:
            return {
                ...state,
                currentLyricIndex:action.currentLyricIndex
            };
        default:
            return state;
    }
}

export default reducer;
